greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, read by rows of 3n+1 terms, where row n+1 is generated by taking partial sums of row n and then appending 2 zeros followed by the final term in the partial sums of row n, for n>=0, with T(0,0)=1.
xref: Cf. A130458 (final term in rows); A130456 (variant).
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, May 26 2007
